a2: The "Scoville Scale" of "Tear Gas" (8.6M) is much bigger than the peppers to its left, so it has the highest steam.
a3: The height of the steam stands for the extend of spiciness, where the corresponding thing of the far right person is in the first place.
a4: The "Scoville Scale" of "Tear Gas" (8.6M) is smaller than "Naga Viper Chill Pepper" (1.3M), making it the hottest pepper shown in the chart.
